availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Dison Addison McGriger (Caldwell County Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Caldwell County Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Goodacre McGriger in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on October 18, 1832. Father of Elizabeth McGriger, John McGriger, Filinder J. McGriger, James D. McGriger, William D. McGriger, Peyton N. McGriger, Noah McGriger, M. S. McGriger, M. P. McGriger, and R. T. McGriger. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Resident in Caldwell County in 1860.
